Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jae Crowder?

Jae Crowder is 34 years old.

Where was Jae Crowder born?

Jae Crowder was born in Villa Rica, Georgia.

When was Jae Crowder born?

Jae Crowder was born on July 6, 1990.

How tall is Jae Crowder?

Jae Crowder is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much does Jae Crowder weigh?

Jae Crowder weighs 235 lbs (106 kg).

Is Jae Crowder in the Hall of Fame?

Jae Crowder is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Jae Crowder drafted?

Jae Crowder was drafted by Cleveland Cavaliers, 2nd round (4th pick, 34th overall), 2012 NBA Draft.

What position does Jae Crowder play?

Small Forward and Power Forward.

What is Jae Crowder's net worth?

Jae Crowder has made at least $67,690,895 playing professional basketball.

How much does Jae Crowder make?

Jae Crowder made $10,183,800 in 2023.

What does Jae Crowder average?

Jae Crowder averages 2.9 points, 2.4 rebounds, and 0.6 assists per game.

How many rings does Jae Crowder have?

Jae Crowder has won 0 championships.

What is Jae Crowder's Twitter account?

Jae Crowder is on Twitter at CJC9BOSS.

What is Jae Crowder's Instagram account?

Jae Crowder is on Instagram at bossmann99.

What schools did Jae Crowder attend?

Jae Crowder attended Villa Rica in Villa Rica, Georgia and Marquette.

What are Jae Crowder's nicknames?

The Beast is a nickname for Jae Crowder.
